tool_description: Pipican is a comprehensive and user-friendly API that serves as a powerful tool for locating and discovering dog parks and dog-friendly beaches. Up to 18.000 locations, this API is designed to simplify the process of finding suitable outdoor spaces for dogs and their owners, Pipican offers an extensive database of dog-friendly areas, enabling developers to create engaging applications and services that cater to the needs of dog enthusiasts.
name: Pipican - Dog Park and Dog Beach Locator API
title: Pipican - Dog Park and Dog Beach Locator API
tool_name: Pipican - Dog Park and Dog Beach Locator API

api_list.name: Basic pipican list
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pipican-dog-park-and-dog-beach-locator-api.p.rapidapi.com/nearby-basic"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pipican-dog-park-and-dog-beach-locator-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Extended pipican
api_list.description:
This API endpoint offers comprehensive information about dog parks and beaches within a flexible radius of up to 50 kilometers from a specified reference coordinate. This endpoint provides an extensive list of dog park details like the next example:

{
            "park_features": {
                "water_pump": false,
                "fence": false,
                "chairs": false,
                "trash": false,
                "trees": false,
                "accesibility": false,
                "training": false,
                "shadow": false,
                "big_small": false
            },
            "center_coord": {
                "type": "Point",
                "coordinates": [
                    41.38092235,
                    2.06456245
                ]
            },
            "_id": "6226318f1dd149a77c27c189",
            "properties": {
                "@id": "way/873298876",
                "leisure": "dog_park"
            },
            "type": "Feature",
            "feature_id": "way/873298876",
            "__v": 0,
            "credits": "www.openstreetmap.org. The data is made available under ODbL.",
            "raw_address": {
                "display_name": "Carrer de Narcís Monturiol, Polígon industiral del Sud-oest, Sant Just Desvern, Baix Llobregat, Barcelona, Catalunya, 08960, España",
                "road": "Carrer de Narcís Monturiol",
                "industrial": "Polígon industiral del Sud-oest",
                "town": "Sant Just Desvern",
                "county": "Baix Llobregat",
                "state_district": "Barcelona",
                "ISO3166-2-lvl6": "ES-B",
                "state": "Catalunya",
                "ISO3166-2-lvl4": "ES-CT",
                "postcode": "08960",
                "country": "España",
                "country_code": "es"
            },
            "distance": "2.6808"
 }

api_list.name: Advanced Pipican list Radius
api_list.description:
This API endpoint offers an extensive and detailed list of advanced information regarding pipicans (dog parks) and dog beaches within a designated radius of up to 200km.  This endpoint also returns the geometry object which can be used to draw the area of the park within a map.

Example:

api_list.name: Advanced Pipican list BBOX
api_list.description:
This API endpoint offers an extensive and detailed list of advanced information regarding pipicans (dog parks) and dog beaches within a designated bounding box area, an axis-aligned rectangle, determined by <height> and <width>.  This endpoint also returns the geometry object which can be used to draw the area of the park within a map.

Example:

            "geometry": {
                "type": "Polygon",
                "coordinates": [
